member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.ImageEditor.SfImageEditor
member.summary: Represents a control that helps in editing the image.
member.remarks: The SfImageEditor control is a very handy tool to edit an image by annotating with text and built-in shapes. It allows you to crop, rotate, and flip an image and has an in built toolvar to perform these operations.
